title: Moon in 6th House for Libra Ascendant
summary: When the Moon transits the 6th house for Libra Ascendant, emotions are directed toward work routines, service, health, and daily responsibilities. Sensitivity increases around criticism, efficiency, and problem-solving. You may feel emotionally invested in helping others or managing tasks, yet mood fluctuations can affect consistency. Workplace dynamics feel personal, making boundaries important. This phase supports healing work, caregiving roles, and disciplined self-care. Emotional regulation strengthens productivity, resilience, and overall well-being during demanding periods.

sections.heading: Finance & Growth
points: Income from service or support roles

closing: Moon in the 6th house refines Libra Ascendant through service, when emotions are managed with structure and care.
